nodes.text: The University of Reles was located in the city Reles, on the planet Spintir. On the outskirts of the university's campus was the Museum of Spintir, which housed Governor Haal's personal collection, including a holocron. The Imperial governor arranged for this by getting grants for the university from the Empire. It was known to have produced prominent galactic scholars who came from humble local beginnings with the help of the university's generous scholarships.
The University of Reles had an archive of the genetic data on the species of Spintir, and studies were attempted to determine why there was such a high percentage of mammalian species on the planet.
